price: Rabbiin dhugaan gabbaramaan isa malee hin jiru. Maqoonni babbareedoon isaaf tahe.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā
